entries.entry: We talked about HTML components and how to make grid layouts with Flexbox in CSS.

We talked about how to automate our javasript to create HTML.

TEST OF THE EDIT FEATURE!!

YEH IT WORKS!!!!
We talked about how we need to understand the data flow of things when we are automating our HTML.
Steve went over the edit and more advanced

entries.concept: Daily Journal - Editing Entries using PUT and populating fields with hidden input
entries.entry: Steps > 1) add Edit Button, 2) add Button clicked event listener, 3) dispatch Custom Event editButtonClicked, 4) have the form listening for event - editButtonClicked, 5) do .find to get note matching journal ID#, 6) populate fields in form, 7) check the hidden input field for ID#, 8) if blank then do a POST if ID# not blank then do a PUT,  9)  dispatch custom event - newEditedJournal, 10) render the journal.  => I was STUCK and it would not do the EDIT,  I found that I had the wrong ID entryID was the correct detail ID not noteId.
